data.enText: the space between two lines or surfaces that join, measured in degrees
a 45˚ angle
the direction that sth is leaning or pointing in when it is not in a vertical or horizontal line
The tower of Pisa leans at an angle .
The plane was coming in at a steep angle.

data.chText: 他的头发都竖了起来，乱蓬蓬的。
data.enText: His hair was sticking up at all angles.
a position from which you look at sth

data.chText: 这张照片是从不寻常的角度拍摄的。
data.enText: The photo was taken from an unusual angle.
a particular way of presenting or thinking about a situation, problem, etc.

data.chText: 我们需要从一个新的角度去展开下一次广告活动。
data.enText: We need a new angle for our next advertising campaign.

data.chText: 你可以从很多不同的角度看这个问题。
data.enText: You can look at the issue from many different angles.

data.chText: 这篇文章集中讨论了故事中人的情感问题。
data.enText: The article concentrates on the human angle (= the part that concerns people's emotions) of the story.
to move or place sth so that it is not straight or not directly facing sb/sth

data.chText: 他斜移了椅子，以便坐着观察她。
data.enText: He angled his chair so that he could sit and watch her.

data.chText: 从（某角度）报道；以（某观点）提供信息
data.enText: to present information, a report, etc. based on a particular way of thinking or for a particular audience

data.chText: 这个节目的对象是较年轻的观众。
data.enText: The programme is angled towards younger viewers.
to catch fish with a line and a hook
angle for sth
to try to get a particular reaction or response from sb, without directly asking for what you want
She was angling for sympathy.
angle for sth
to try to get a particular reaction or response from sb, without directly asking for what you want
She was angling for sympathy.

tr: a biased way of looking at or presenting something
the space between two lines or planes that intersect
the inclination of one line to another

example: He biased his presentation so as to please the share holders

tr: to incline or bend from a vertical position
move or proceed at an angle
example: he angled his way into the room

value.def: An angle is the difference in direction between two lines or surfaces. Angles are measured in degrees.

example.ex: The boat is now leaning at a 30 degree angle.

value.def: An angle is the shape that is created where two lines or surfaces join together.

example.ex: ...brackets to adjust the steering wheel's angle.
example.tran: 用于调整方向盘角度的支架

value.tran: （两条线或两个平面相交的）夹角，边角

value.def: An angle is the direction from which you look at something.

example.ex: Thanks to the angle at which he stood, he could just see the sunset...
example.tran: 由于站的位置视角好，他刚好能看见日落。

example.ex: His face will be discreetly concealed by camera angles.
example.tran: 通过调整照相机的角度，他的脸将被巧妙地遮住。

value.def: You can refer to a way of presenting something or thinking about it as a particular angle .

example.ex: We had to do the scene over and over again, from different angles...
example.tran: 我们不得不翻来覆去地从不同的角度拍这个场面。

example.ex: He was considering the idea from all angles.
example.tran: 他正从各个角度考虑这个想法。

value.tran: 角度；观点；立场；侧重点；倾向性

value.def: If someone is angling for something, they are trying to get it without asking for it directly.

example.ex: It sounds as if he's just angling for sympathy.
example.tran: 听起来好像他只是在博取同情。

value.def: If you angle something or if it angles in a particular direction, it faces or points in that direction.

example.ex: You can open the slats for a bright light or angle them for more shade...
example.tran: 可以调节百叶窗使光线亮一些，也可以暗一些。

example.ex: The path angled downhill and northwards...
example.tran: 小路向山下伸展，然后向北延伸。

example.ex: He drove down the long, steeply angled driveway.
example.tran: 他驱车从又长又陡的车道驶下。

value.def: If something is at an angle, it is leaning in a particular direction so that it is not straight, horizontal, or vertical.

example.ex: An iron bar stuck out at an angle...
The wall's at a slight angle.

trans: 相位角度；相角；相位角；相位；位相角
角钢；角钢出口；求购角钢；角鋼；角钢系列

壓力角；法向压力角；压力角
超广角；广角镜；广角；广角镜头；鱼眼广角镜
倾角；倾斜角；井斜角；刃倾角；磁倾角
前角；刀面角；抠角；斜角；倾角
